title: JSON schema for WordPress wp-env configuration files

core.description: The WordPress installation to use. If null is specified, wp-env will use the latest production release of WordPress.

phpVersion.description: The PHP version to use. If null is specified, wp-env will use the default version used with production release of WordPress.

plugins.description: A list of plugins to install and activate in the environment.

themes.description: A list of themes to install in the environment.

port.description: The primary port number to use for the installation. You'll access the instance through the port: 'http://localhost:8888'.

config.description: Mapping of wp-config.php constants to their desired values.

mappings.description: Mapping of WordPress directories to local directories to be mounted in the WordPress instance.

env.description: The key env is available to override any of the above options on an individual-environment basis.
